title: Shadow Kingdoms
description: The third collection of Robert E. Howard's fantasy work from the legendary pulp magazine Weird Tales (and its rival, Strange Tales) features more classic fiction and poetry from Howard's prime writing years. Gathered here are stories with such enduring and popular characters as Solomon Kane ("The Footfalls Within"), Turlogh Dubh ("The Gods of Bal-Sagoth" and "The Dark Man"), and Cormac of Connacht ("Kings of the Night"). Other highlights include
author: Robert E. Howard
